attributes.action: make silent fireworks the only legal fireworks
attributes.additional_details: i find it cruel that animals and people are fearful of the loud noises of fireworks when they don’t even serve a purpose. the only purpose of a firework is for the colour, not the bang it makes therefore deeming the noise pointless.
attributes.background: ban all fireworks that make noise as they can trigger people with ptsd, animals or people with sensory issues.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
